sys_script_include.name: GetProgramData

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_cc59c17983810a1076389630ceaad3e2
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_1342897_unite_un.GetProgramData</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>GetProgramData</name><script><![CDATA[var GetProgramData = Class.create();
GetProgramData.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
    GetProgram: function () {
		//var programName = this
		var programName = this.getParameter("sysparm_program_name");
		var gr = new GlideRecord('x_1342897_unite_un_program');
		gr.get('name', programName);
		
		var result = {
			"progDesc": gr.getDisplayValue('description')
		};
		return JSON.stringify(result);
	}
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-03-20 13:27:11</sys_created_on><sys_id>cc59c17983810a1076389630ceaad3e2</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>GetProgramData</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Unite University" source="x_1342897_unite_un">64c5b50d8309061076389630ceaad3f1</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Unite University">64c5b50d8309061076389630ceaad3f1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_cc59c17983810a1076389630ceaad3e2</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-03-20 14:48:51</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
